::: With MEGATRON now under his control with blackmail, TRANSANULAS felt a 
little more at ease. He was running the show, at least for the moment. 
Quickstrike needed to give the codes over...if he didnt then they would never 
be able to control the ships functions, and then the battle outside would be 
for nothing. :::

::: TRANSANULAS, in his lab ::: Hah, Soon HLL BEAST will know who his 
superior is...and then I will kill him.

::: He was pouring over computer data when he recived the message from the 
Oblitercons. Quickly, he sent a reply----::::

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Tell Quickstrike this is Transanulas, the clone of 
Tarantulas. I need him alive and safe until I can smuggle him into the ship 
to use his codes. He is a skilled warrior and I cant lose him, not now. 
Please hurry.

::: He sighed, and went back to work. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: BLACK ARACNIA stared at her computer in disbelife ::: Ah, HELL BEAST, 
there have been numerous encrypted messages coming and going from Transanulas 
lab.

::: HELL BEAST, with a frown looks at her screen ::: What in the 
blazes....your right. Magnetically lock him within his lab while we decrypt 
these messages. I want to know what that spider is doing. JACKLE, GREMLIN, go 
gaurd the door.

::: The two Predacons get up and march off the bridge. HELL BEAST then 
watches PHENIOX and BLACK ARACNIA work on decrypting the messages. Once he 
found out who he was sending them to.....:::

::: HELL BEAST ::: GANGON, BRIGHTBLADE! Go and patrol he perimiter. Look for 
anything suspicious. We still dont know where our former commrads are hiding.

~~~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON buzzes into the clearing with currently alot of activity. He 
jets right up to Shredder :::

::: MEGATRON, using a quite pissed off voice ::: Transanulas is black mailing 
me! we must eliminate him now. Quickstrike, how are you? And can you give me 
the codes? We must hurry before HELL BEAST finds out!

::: He says very quickly, and nervously. He bounced around frantically 
jumping from one idae to another :::
